value.message: Variable 'f' in string interpolation is an unclear single-character abbreviation.
value.suggestion: Rename 'f' to a more descriptive name such as 'featureName'.

value.message: Function name 'generateNextSteps' is vague and does not clearly describe the action or context.
value.suggestion: Rename to 'generateConfigurationNextSteps' or similar to clarify purpose.

value.message: Access control logic does not handle errors securely; missing error handling may result in unintended access.
value.suggestion: Add error handling to ensure that any failure in access control logic results in access being denied by default.

value.message: Permissions are controlled by feature toggles without verifying resource ownership; possible IDOR vulnerability.
value.suggestion: Implement backend checks to verify resource ownership and avoid relying solely on client-provided identifiers.
